root.name: Rag Doll Kung Fu
root.description: OverviewRag Doll Kung Fu is a kung fu-themed fighting game. Like the classic kung fu movies, the characters fly around the screen on strings, however all characters in Rag Doll Kung Fu are paper cut-outs. The game includes a complete 16 level story mode, with many unlockable secrets along the way. Players can battle their way through the campaign, battle friends on a single PC with up to 5 people, and participate in online play with up to 8 players.The game was developed at the time by Mark Healey of Lionhead in his spare time.Game ModesSingle PlayerNinja OnslaughtChu Chu Wing PoohRag Doll SoccerRag Doll AthleticsLocal PlayAthleticsMovie MakerOnline PlayDeath MatchRag Doll SoccerPC System RequirementsMinimum:Processor: Pentium3 800 MHz (or compatible)Memory: 256 MB RAMGraphics: GeForce 2OS: Windows 98Recommended:Processor: Pentium4 1500 MHz (or compatible)Memory: 512MB RAMGraphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics cardOS: Windows XP
